Description: Date and time of the carbon flux measurment
Time of the carbon flux measurment (independent of date)
Unique site ID of origin site
Unique site ID of destination site (the site they were measured at)
Unique ID of vegetation turf as origSiteID, treatments and destSiteID
Warming treatment with W for warming or A for ambient
Types of the CO2 flux data: GPP = Gross Primary Productivity, NEE = Net ecosystem exchange, and ER = ecosystem respiration
Unique identifier for each flux measurement
Value for CO2 flux with recommendations from flag applied. Used to calculate GPP.
Flux as calculated with the slopes. No value replaced with flags. No GPP calculated.
Flux corrected for CO2 accumulation in canopy at night. We recommend using that one.
Mean soil temperature measured during flux measurements.
Mean air temperature measured during the flux measurments. Not recommended for microclimate analyses.
Flagging missing or unreliable data. This information can be used to sort unwanted observations.
